items.content_html: A two-way chat bridge between Hypixel guild chat and a Discord channel. The application utilizes discord.js v14 for communicating with Discord, and mineflayer for communicating with Hypixel.

items.content_html: Current Location Weather is a lightweight and user-friendly web application that utilizes geolocation and weather APIs to fetch and display real-time weather updates based on your current location. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this app offers an interactive interface to provide users with accurate and timely weather information.
items.title: Rashmi-2005-Ranjan/Current-Location-Weather: Current Location Weather is a lightweight and user-friendly web application that utilizes geolocation and weather APIs to fetch and display real-time weather updates based on your current location. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this app offers an interactive interface to provide users with accurate and timely weather information.

items.content_html: A lightweight web application built with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS that detects the network status and type of network on a device. This tool provides real-time feedback on whether the device is online or offline and displays additional details about the type of internet connection.
items.title: Rashmi-2005-Ranjan/Network-Connection-Checker: A lightweight web application built with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS that detects the network status and type of network on a device. This tool provides real-time feedback on whether the device is online or offline and displays additional details about the type of internet connection.

items.content_html: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: A fun side project that serves as an offline alternative to the TDSB Connects app. Built as a Progressive Web App (PWA), it runs locally on your device and doesn’t rely on servers, offering a lightweight, efficient, and reliable experience.
items.title: HassanSattar3/Better-Tdsb-Connect-App: A fun side project that serves as an offline alternative to the TDSB Connects app. Built as a Progressive Web App (PWA), it runs locally on your device and doesn’t rely on servers, offering a lightweight, efficient, and reliable experience.
